title: An Act establishing a commission to study the availability of a continuum of care for persons with substance use disorder

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Miranda, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1412) of Liz Miranda for legislation to establish a commission to study the availability of a continuum of care for persons with substance use disorder.  Mental Health, Substance Use and Recovery.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Mental Health, Substance Use and Recovery

related_entities.name: committee on Mental Health, Substance Use and Recovery

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 07/28/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently
committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

actions.description: Committee recommended ought to pass and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on Senate Ways and Means
committee on Senate Ways and Means
